metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1591 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The image module in Drupal 7.x before 7.14 does not properly checkpermissions when caching derivative image styles of private images, whichallows remote attackers to read private image styles.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1591` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
